Title: 40282 - # Kinds of Software That Small Business Owners Should Invest In
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 different kinds of software that small business owners should consider investing in. You can mention software for things like online accounting, cloud security, communication and collaboration. Your target audience is tech-savvy, small business owners. You can place your target URL by mentioning the importance of cloud security and explaining how small business owners can keep the data in their cloud safe.
